meanings.definition: A person who challenges or competes against others.
meanings.sent1: The challengers in the race were determined to win.
meanings.sent2: The challengers in the debate presented strong arguments.
meanings.sent3: The challengers in the game cheered each other on.
meanings.sent4: The challengers in the tournament fought bravely till the end.
meanings.sent5: The challengers in the competition showed great sportsmanship.

meanings.definition: A group of people who challenge or compete against others.
meanings.sent1: The team of challengers worked together to overcome obstacles.
meanings.sent2: The challengers gathered to discuss their strategies.
meanings.sent3: The challengers celebrated their victory with a group hug.
meanings.sent4: The challengers stood united against their common foe.
meanings.sent5: The challengers supported each other through thick and thin.
